title: Westcott 13168 Right- and Left-Handed Scissors, Kids' Scissors, Ages 4-8, 5-Inch Blunt Tip, Assorted, 2 Pack
description: These 5" blunt scissors are specially designed for a child's hand. The molded, asymmetrical handles for comfort and control. These Westcott scissors have hard handles and safety-ground blades. These small scissors cut through paper, fabric, string, and other craft materials easily. Westcott is dedicated to supporting education and inspiring creative activities in the classroom and at home. Westcott products are specifically designed for growing students and created to be fun and functional with superior quality and exceptional value.
